## Template Pack Request

### Language/Framework

- **Language:** (e.g., Go, Rust, Java)
- **Framework:** (e.g., Gin, Actix, Spring Boot)
- **Use Case:** (e.g., REST API, GraphQL, Microservice)

### Motivation

Why would this template pack be useful? What projects would benefit?

### Key Features

What features should this pack include?

- [ ] Database support (specify which)
- [ ] Authentication (specify method)
- [ ] Docker support
- [ ] CI/CD integration
- [ ] Testing framework
- [ ] API documentation
- [ ] Other: _____________

### Example Projects

Are there example projects using this stack you can reference?

### Similar Existing Packs

Are there similar packs in the ecosystem we can learn from?

### Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I'm willing to help implement this pack
- [ ] I can provide code examples
- [ ] I can review/test the implementation
- [ ] I just want to request it

Any other information about the pack you'd like to add.
